body:
Hi, Following this [discussion](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/xn/detail/2985220:Comment:1697513) and this [one](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/generating-test-points-from-multiple-surfaces?page=1&commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1697755&x=1#2985220Comment1697755) i'm trying to set the whole process of a grid simulation. Suddenly i get this error with the HB_runDaylightAnalysis: Runtime error (IndexOutOfRangeException): index out of range: 1
Traceback:
  line 2495, in RADNonPlanarChildSurface, "<string>"
  line 1697, in writeRADAndMaterialFiles, "<string>"
  line 193, in main, "<string>"
  line 258, in script I'm assuming there is a bug with non planar windows ... or maybe i'm missing something? Thanks, -A.
